summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 23, 2019. It includes count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms, with one roster specifically listing inmate Jeffrey Epstein by name and registration number. The documents detail routine prison population counts and inmate assignments.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed by name and registration number (76318-054) on an inmate roster for an attorney visit assignment on July 23, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Prison Count and Inmate Roster
events.description: Routine administrative counts and inmate assignments were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York. Jeffrey Epstein was listed on an inmate roster for an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 23, 2019.
The documents show routine prison administrative procedures, including population counts and inmate assignments.
One form indicates Epstein was scheduled for an assignment categorized as 'ATTY' (attorney) on that date.
The documents are dated the day before Epstein's death on July 24, 2019, making them part of the final administrative records of his incarceration.
